meta.title: Metafield - Models - API Reference
meta.description: Allows app partners to write custom data to various resources in the API.

blocks.data: Allows app partners to write custom data to various resources in the API.

permission_set.description: Determines whether the field is completely private to the app that owns the field (`app_only`), or visible to other API consumers (`read`), or completely open for reading and writing to other apps (`write`).

namespace.description: Namespace for the metafield, for organizational purposes.

key.description: The name of the field, for example: `location_id`, `color`.

value.description: The value of the field, for example: `1`, `blue`.

resource_type.description: The type of resource with which the metafield is associated.

resource_id.description: The unique identifier for the resource with which the metafield is associated.

id.description: The unique identifier for the metafields.

created_at.description: Date and time of the metafield's creation.

updated_at.description: Date and time when the metafield was last updated.
